sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5b473ce1dba710100080e1bb4b9619cb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_537510_verizon_t.TimeCardUtil </api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TimeCardUtil </name><script><![CDATA[var TimeCardUtil  = Class.create();{
TimeCardUtil.dayNames = ["", "monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"];

TimeCardUtil.getStartOfCurrentWeek = function(userId) {
    var todayDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
    var today = new GlideDate();
    today.setDisplayValue(todayDateTime.getDisplayValue());
    if (gs.nil(userId))
        userId = gs.getUserID();
    return;
};


/*TimeCardUtil .prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'TimeCardUtil '*/ 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-29 02:44:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>5b473ce1dba710100080e1bb4b9619cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TimeCardUtil </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5b473ce1dba710100080e1bb4b9619cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 02:44:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_987ca82ddb6710100080e1bb4b961924
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_537510_verizon_t_verizon_time_card</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate the week starts for monday</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
var dow = gdt.getDayOfWeekUTC();
if (dow > 1){ //If today isn't a monday
 
  var math = 7 - dow - 6;
  gdt.addDaysUTC(math);
   
}

current.u_week_starts_on.setValue(gdt.getValue()); 
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-29 02:06:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>987ca82ddb6710100080e1bb4b961924</sys_id><sys_mod_count>75</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate the week starts for monday</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_987ca82ddb6710100080e1bb4b961924</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-30 19:18:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=987ca82ddb6710100080e1bb4b961924"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_537510_verizon_t_verizon_time_card</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate week start</name><order>400</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var weekStarts = current.getValue('u_week_starts_on');
		
	var gd1 = new GlideDate(); 
		gd1.setValue(weekStarts); 
	var expectedStartDay = gd1.getDayOfWeekUTC();
	
	if(expectedStartDay != 1){
			
		gs.setError('This is not a Monday');
		//gs.addErrorMessage('This is not a Monday')
			current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-25 22:52:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate week start</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-28 21:38:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a231cb95db6310100080e1bb4b961946
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_537510_verizon_t.TimeCardUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TimeCardUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var TimeCardUtil = Class.create();
TimeCardUtil.dayNames = ["", "u_float_1", "u_float_2", "u_float_3", "u_float_4", "u_float_5"];

TimeCardUtil.getStartOfCurrentWeek = function(userId) {
    var todayDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
    var today = new GlideDate();
    today.setDisplayValue(todayDateTime.getDisplayValue());
    if (gs.nil(userId))
        userId = gs.getUserID();
    return TimeCardUtil.getStartOfWeekByDate(today, userId);
};

TimeCardUtil.getStartOfNextWeek = function(userId) {
    var nextWeekStart = TimeCardUtil.getStartOfCurrentWeek(userId);
    nextWeekStart.addDaysUTC(5);
    return nextWeekStart;
};

TimeCardUtil.getStartOfLastWeek = function(userId) {
    var lastWeekStart = TimeCardUtil.getStartOfCurrentWeek(userId);
    lastWeekStart.addDaysUTC(-5);
    return lastWeekStart;
};

TimeCardUtil.getStartOfWeekByDate = function(aDate, userId) {
    var weekStarts = current.getValue('u_week_starts_on');
	var timeSheetPolicy = weekStarts.getFromUserId(userId);
    var firstDayOfWeek = timeSheetPolicy.weekStartsOn();

    var gd = new GlideDate();
    gd.setValue(aDate);
    var currentDay = gd.getDayOfWeekUTC();

    var daysInWeek = 5;
    var daysToMoveBehind = (firstDayOfWeek - currentDay - daysInWeek) % daysInWeek;
    gd.addDaysUTC(daysToMoveBehind);

    return gd;
};

TimeCardUtil.getWeekStartsOnDateTimeForUser = function(weekStartsOnDate, userId) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    gr.get(userId);
    var timeZoneId = gr.getValue('time_zone');
    var timeZone;
    if (JSUtil.nil(timeZoneId))
        timeZone = gs.getSession().getTimeZone();
    else
        timeZone = Packages.java.util.TimeZone.getTimeZone(timeZoneId);

    var weekStartsOnDateTimeForUser = new GlideDateTime();
    weekStartsOnDateTimeForUser.setTZ(timeZone);
    weekStartsOnDateTimeForUser.setDisplayValueInternal(weekStartsOnDate + ' 00:00:00');
    return weekStartsOnDateTimeForUser;
};


TimeCardUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'TimeCardUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-28 18:10:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>a231cb95db6310100080e1bb4b961946</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TimeCardUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a231cb95db6310100080e1bb4b961946</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-28 21:29:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

getDay.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {


   getDayOfWeek: function(){


   var date = new GlideDateTime(this.getParameter('sysparm_date'));


   var dow = date.getDayOfWeekLocalTime();



   return dow;

   type: 'getDay'


});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-29 12:57:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>99c30b2ddb2310100080e1bb4b9619fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getDay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_99c30b2ddb2310100080e1bb4b9619fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 12:58:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_537510_verizon_t_verizon_time_card</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate week start</name><order>500</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(current.u_week_starts_on);
	if(gdt.getDayOfWeekUTC()!=1){


      //gs.addInfoMessage('Week Starts On Date Must Be a Sunday');


      current.u_week_starts_on.setError('Week starts on date must be a Monday');


      current.setAbortAction(true);


}






})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-26 00:15:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9a4834e8db6310100080e1bb4b961932</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate week start</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9a4834e8db6310100080e1bb4b961932</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 14:37:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9a4834e8db6310100080e1bb4b961932"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_537510_verizon_t_verizon_time_card</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>No more than 10 hrs  a day </name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var mondayHrs = current.getValue('u_float_1'); 
	var tuesdayHrs = current.getValue('u_float_2'); 
	var wednesdayHrs = current.getValue('u_float_3'); 
	var thursdayHrs = current.getValue('u_float_4'); 
	var fridayHrs = current.getValue('u_float_5');
	
if((mondayHrs > 10 && tuesdayHrs > 10) && (wednesdayHrs > 10 && thursdayHrs > 10) && fridayHrs > 10){
	
gs.addErrorMessage('No more than 10 hours a day'); 
	
    current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-25 22:49:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3d25e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961919</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>No more than 10 hrs  a day </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3d25e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961919</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-29 19:53:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3d25e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961919"/></record_update>
